definition: Xiang (Hunanese) dialect spoken in Hunan Province
abbr. for Hunan 湖南 province in south central China/abbr. for Xiangjiang river in Hunan province

sentences.english: Hany ing accents belonged to south - west standard, with the features of Hunan accents.
sentences.chinese: 漢陰方言屬西南官話，具有濃郁湘語特色。

sentences.english: Shuangfeng dialect is one of the most representative dialect in the Xiang dialect.
sentences.chinese: 雙峯方言是湘語婁邵片中最有代表性的方言之一。
